ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: The onlyOwner modifier is applied to ownership and pausing functions, restricting sensitive operations to the owner.
ImplementedSecurityControls.IntegerSafety: SafeMath library used for all mathematical operations to prevent overflows and underflows.
ImplementedSecurityControls.TransferLock: The Pausable functionality is used to lock token transfers during an emergency.

SecurityMeasuresAndExistingProtections.FallbackFunctionality: A fallback function is present to prevent accidental Ether transfers to the contract by reverting any such transaction.
